column30: According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, getting vaccinated against COVID can lower your risk of receiving and spreading the virus that causes COVID. Vaccines can also help prevent serious illness and death. Do you know who works for this organization? That's right! Scientists!! People who garner their anti-vax disinformation from some conspiracy theorist nuts with a chip on their shoulder because they did not receive the top prize for a science project in high school are both stupid and reckless - endangering the lives of responsible citizens who take stock in reasoned, analytical thinking. The ludicrous and woefully disruptive Canadian trucker convoy should be dispersed as quickly as possible. Tear gas the idiots, if that is what must be done. I am a proud union man. But the approximately 4000 harebrained New York City municipal workers who refuse vaccination should lose their jobs. Mayor Adams is to be applauded for his support of those employees who behaved in an adult-like manner, following simple, effective vaccine protocols.

After all the COVID denial, after misleading untold numbers of their viewers to their deaths with anti-vaxxer lies...Even as they CONTINUE to spew anti-vaxx... fox news makes its employees reveal vax status or wear a mask...F**K RIGHTWING MURDERERS... twitterurl

Anti mask and anti vax Republicans are like a sheep herder killing off all the sheep dogs to protect the sheep from all the wolves and then ignore all the dead sheep and getting mad when someone tells them to get more sheep dogs!

A report last week from the American Academy of Pediatrics indicates caseloads of children in whom COVID has been diagnosed only keep rising. According to Dr. Moira Szilagyi, President of the American Academy of Pediatrics, After nearly two years of this pandemic, we know that this disease has not always been mild in children, and weve seen some kids suffer severe illness, both in the short term and in the long term. Placing a red MAGA cap of ignorance on the head of a child isnt enough. Anti-vax parents ruthlessly endanger the lives of their children when they insist upon extending their lunacy to another generation.

At this moment, it appears that America will not get enough of it's citizens vaccinated to reach """"herd immunity, the level required to suppress transmission to the point that the disease no longer circulates freely in the community. The issue is not technology. Thanks to a whole series of companies around the world who moved to create their vaccines within 48 hours from the time the Chinese scientists first released the viruses genetic sequence, followed by months of testing in nations around the world, the vaccines are safe and efficient. It's not a matter of vaccine doses supply. Thanks to President Biden, who moved to acquire hundreds of millions of doses and establish hundreds of mass vaccination sites, there are more than enough doses to cover every American citizen No. The problem is vaccine acceptance. And very specifically, the problem is the refusal of nearly half of Republicans to go out and get vaccinated. Those Republicans have given any number of reasons they don't want a jab. Some of them use old anti-vax themes about mercury ( not there ) or a mythical protein that causes women to become infertile ( multiple women got pregnant and had children while taking part in trials ) or a microchip that allows tech giants to constantly track your location ( it's called a cell phone ). But what all those reasons put together say is, thete is no reason, no reason other than the one that shapes everything Republicans do these days, owning the libs.

column1: Toward a Federal Liberal Government - ForwardForEveryone
column30: # **Beware the convoy  It appears as a western fifth column to take down Canada.** The Freedom Convoy has been a disgusting stain foisted on Canada by western separatists. The truckers and their entourage were parking around the Cenotaph, prancing (and pissing) in the snow on the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier, waving Nazi flags, hanging an anti-vax post on the Terry Fox monument, mooching free meals from a soup kitchen, and screaming at the media covering the protest. This was a western super spreader event that will drive covid numbers up in Ontario. If this disgrace is not dealt with firmly, it could drive Canada towards anti-democratic illiberalism and the breakdown of public trust in its institutions. These truckers are not ordinary protesters, theyre hopeless. Protests have been premised on a simple principle: The government isnt living up to its own laws, or its laws undercut its claims of justice and fairness for all. The protest is intended to bring out thousands of people to shame the government into respecting its own proclaimed beliefs in justice, equality, freedom, the rule of law. These truckers have disregarded those principles. The reasons for their cross-country convoy morphed from day to day, hour to hour. Freedom from vaccination vanished; now it was the whole public health response that had to go, and never mind that the federal government cant much influence the provinces on such issues. Then a strange alliance of the Governor-General and the Senate was supposed to oust Justin Trudeau and then what? Hand the country over to the truckers? These truckers and their organizers dont seem to have a very clear sense of any kind of history. They did know that swastikas trigger people, like a thumbtack on the teachers chair. They wanted to own us, get a rise out of us, by telling us how little they shared of our values. Weve seen this show evolve six years ago south of the border. Trump could insult and undermine American institutions, and persuade Americans that some weird Deep State had taken over their country, from the media to the FBI to the electoral system. He didnt have to marshal arguments, cite authorities, or otherwise try to persuade skeptics. You could just dump on anyone who didnt agree with you. There was no logic and he gave America hate as a faith. So the truckers and their supporters have behaved very badly to challenge Canadians who respect and trust in their institutions. You admire Terry Fox? We couldnt care less. You respect our fallen soldiers? Piss on them. Youre in the media? We dont need to give you a sound bite about what we want  just a few seconds of abusing you as a stooge of a lying newspaper or broadcaster. The same disrespect went out to every healthcare worker, every teacher, and every civil servant. Make their jobs harder, push them to burn out and quit so the hospitals and schools and governments cant function as well. No one knows whats true anymore, which is a precondition for fascism. The Freedom Convoy, then, is a deliberate provocation, a test of the municipal and federal governments: Well show you what we think of you and your sacred institutions. Now, what are you going to do about it? Trudeau senior would have said Just watch me, and called in the army. Jagmeet Singh has confined himself to severe disapproval of vile, violent and hateful behaviour. The truckers have also effectively neutered the Conservative Party of Canada. Erin OToole could neither reject them nor endorse them, just as he couldnt come out for or against vaccination. Meanwhile, Maxime Berniers Peoples Party of Canada was in the thick of it and likely signing up plenty of members. Our governments seem to have made a disastrous misjudgment. Where the truckers and their supporters are violating laws, they should be promptly arrested. These arrests should continue as long as needed and it would show Canada and the world that were serious about peace, order and good government and public health as well. Justice delayed is justice denied for such people. Worse yet, justice is both denied and discredited for the rest of us.

Did you guys know the FDA just approved a drug that reduces your chance of getting COVID-19 by 5X? Its trade name is called Wearamaskasshole. Side effects include mild inconvienience, possible victim complex, fear of people thinking you are a sheeple, being ostracized by your anti-vax plandemic bros, and the power to stop your own asymptomatic transmission as this country stubbornly dives right on into that second wave. Check with your doctor, or really anyone, to see if Wearamaskasshole is right for you.

column1: Republicans and Democrats United for Biden-Harris
column30: Fellow Ohioans, what do you think about DeWine's 5 million dollars drawing for those who have been vaccinated? I'm all for getting people vaccinated, but at the same time I feel like this money should be used to help schools, people who lost their jobs, etc. We are fortunate that our school district has the money to provide Chrome books to all students, but there's a lot of districts who can't. Believe me. I'd love to win the money, but I'm also worried people still won't get vaccinated and the money could have been better spent. Do you think it will work? I'm also afraid we will see spikes once the restrictions are lifted. Everyone I know is fully vaccinated(we have smart friends), dd is 12 yrs, so hoping to get an appointment for her's this week or next. I feel we are safe, but still worry for younger kids and those who can't get the vax because of medical conditions.
Fla landlord insisting on vax to live there!

Florida is headed for another lock down if we don't wake-up, mask-up, and vax-up now. By ignoring science and blocking masking-up and vaxxing-up needs, Governor DeSantis is essentially letting this virus and it's variants run rampant. By not taking action against this viral enemy he is going to cause what he's afraid of.

From The Lincoln Project August 17, 2021 Last week we released our ad Back to School calling out Texas Gov. Greg Abbott and Florida Governor Ron DeSantis for endangering the lives of school children with their anti-vax, anti-mask COVID conspiracies. Since then, youd like to think they figured it out and decided to put our kids safety before their partisan propaganda campaign. Remember this? Florida got it right, and the lockdown states got it wrong. Yeah, right. They doubled down. You already know Abbott immediately rallied his team of mob-mouthpieces to attack the Lincoln Project and fundraise off our ad. Ron DeSantis? Still spewing lies while Floridians die, and now hes facing the heat. 5,600 kids in Tampa are quarantined right now. Its an entire district. Rates are soaring. DeSantis is still putting the talking points of Trump loyalists and far-right talking heads before the needs of Floridians. Hes met with Sean Hannity more times this term than hes met with his own Lieutenant Governor. Hes held multiple meetings with Tucker Carlson, Laura Ingraham, and Hannity before hes had one meeting with Floridas top public health official. You know how Fox News keeps having people on saying Im not a doctor, but (insert anti-vax garbage)... well, were not doctors either, but Fox News is killing people. And while DeSantis is going to war to prevent Floridas public schools from instituting mask mandates that we know save lives, the school where he sent his own kids, of course, has a mask mandate. This hypocrisy is now the platform of the new GOP. Its more of the same. Secretly vaccinated Republican Congresspeople applauding low vaccination rates. Sowing distrust in health officials and chaos in our emergency rooms. Endangering lives of everyday American children while their own families skirt the risk in fancy private schools. While DeSantis is campaigning to be our next American dictator, Floridians are dying. And were not going to take it lying down. Watch our ad and share it widely, so we can get it in front of the voters who matter. The GOP is no longer a Party. This is no longer about politics. Its about life and death and democracy and authoritarianism.  The Lincoln Project

From under 100 deaths per day to over a 1,000 An audience of Trump deadenders booed The Donald when he encouraged them to get vaccinated Saturday. Sensing his mistake he quickly pivoted """"You've got your freedoms."""" That's why we're 20 months into pandemic restrictions with only slightly over 70 % American adults vaccinated. But the current covid surge is due to extreme discrepancy in percentages of the vaccinated. The redder the political affiliation of a county or state, the lower the vaccination rate and the higher the infection and death rate due to that discrepancy. Trump and his self destructive GOP have given us a death annuity from their governance. Eight months out of office and they're still getting folks infected and killed, one delusional anti- vax, anti-mask statement at a time.

Front Line Covid-19 Critical Care Alliance, is an anti-vax group that is run by Dr. Pierre Kory. Just to give you a little insight on Dr.Kory. He is a frequent guest on Fox and on Joe Rogan's podcast. Dr. Kory's group has been pushing for those infected with coronavirus, but whom the horse paste didn't work ( shock! ) to instead treat Covid-19 with spironolactone and finasteride. What are those you ask? Oh just testosterone suppressants, because more men were dying of Covid than women. So instead of taking a free, safe, and effective vaccine, the same coal rolling, petro masculinists who spent years shouting """"snowflake """" as an insult and denigrating left wing men for being feminized because we believe women about rape and we didn't follow a misogynist pig, are now, eagerly consuming """" medical """" advice telling them to take the actual medications trans women use to suppress testosterone. What could be worse than an illness that would force the mighty ( insecure) MAGA man to self feminize? The Covid vaccine, of course! Oh, there's more. Christopher Key, who leads a Anti-Vax group called """" Vaccine Police """" is insisting that his followers undergo """" urine therapy """" Yes, apparently they have """" tons and tons of research """" showing the """" antidote """" to the vaccine ( which Key calls """"the worst bioweapon he has ever seen"""") is drinking your own pee. While It's unclear how many bioweapons this flamethrower Anti-Vaxer has seen, or how drinking your pee is supposed to protect you from the effects of other people taking the vaccine, his passion is undeniable. But hey, at least you'll know when you're talking to one of these nuts, because they won't be wearing a mask and you'll be able to smell the pee on their breath! Best not to get too close though, for a number of reasons. Never stop demanding more my brothers and sisters :red_heart:

column1: Republicans and Democrats United for Biden-Harris
column30: HOW DO YOU ADDRESS PEOPLE WHO SAY COVID IS A GOVERNMENT """"PLANDEMIC"""", COUNTS ARE FAKE, IT'S A HOAX, IT'S A FLU, DON'T VAX, BIDEN IS A CROOK?

How many of Yall remember all those vaccinations we got as kids in the 1960's??? Polio, Diptheria, Typhoid, TB, etc... I do. All except the Smallpox vaccination. Had the round scare to show I got it.. A true badge of courage... I remember... Saved thousands upon thousands of lives. Got the vaccinations at the school... Say what one will in the anti-vax world. Personally, I am Really Glad I never had to fear getting Polio, Smallpox, and TB... They didn't have measles & chickenpox vaccinations when I was little, (born 1954). I had them both at the same time. My Mother an RN said the fevers almost killed me more than once... Now there are viable/workable Vactinces for Both... Cool huh? No other Mommy will ever have to go through what My Mommy did... David Pope Alsea, OR

column1: Republicans and Democrats United for Biden-Harris
column30: How will the anti vax morons respond if mutations allow the virus to kill children?
How will the anti vax morons respond if mutations allow the virus to kill children?

I copied this from Democratic Underground, and yes it has swearing. I dont think they should be removed as it helps you understand the feeling the writer had. And in the bigger picture being offended by swearing in the age of inserection might be necessary. Here goes, from DU-- Glamrock I honestly could give two shits if it makes me a bad person anymore! Ive fucking had it. Im done. Congratulations conservatives! Youve turned me into a sociopath. Good on you! My darling, beautiful wife told me her anti-vax sister is upset because she cant attend a number of concerts this year without proof of vaccination. Its not fair! Yeah, its not fair. You know whats not fair? The fact that you and millions of other brain dead morons are willingly putting people in danger of losing their lives because youre an idiot. You know whats not fair? That 900k Americans have died because you know better than the experts in this field. You know better because youre listening to the likes of Joe Rogan and Sean Hannity and every motherfucker who tells you your uninformed, bigoted, misogynistic, ignorant world view is correct. You know whats not fair? The fact that I have changed into you because of you. That Washington State Trooper that told the governor to kiss his ass, he wasnt getting vaccinated? Good. Fuck him. Good fucking riddance. Sorry for the more evolved in his family, but those that agreed with him? Fuck you. Glad hes dead. The countless A.M. radio/YouTubers/podcasters who have died while singing this song? Fuck you too. And fuck your families if they think youre a hero for the stance that killed your dumb ass. I am sooooo fucking done with these people. They cant die fast enough or soon enough for me. By all means, dont get vaxxed. Suffer the inevitable intubation and/or lasting serious health consequences and possibly death since, unlike other sentient beings, you cant be bothered to think critically about a)the actual facts and who youre getting youre information from. And more importantly, b) who you might be affecting (Read killing, with your grinning ignorance). Ufirtunately, your stance impacts me and I wish insurance companies would charge you more for that risky behavior instead of having my premimum subsidize yours. I wish a requirement for admidtance into an ICU was a vaccination, you can die at home not taking up valuable room responsible others should have. As far as I can tell with my horrible math skills is that, at minimum, you all have sacrificed hundreds of thousands of your own because you dont have the capacity to think critically, or are so fanatical in your beliefs that you refuse to accept the reality of this reality. Youre the same people that refuse to see the danger of climate change. Youre the same people that cheer tax cuts for billionaires while your taxes go up to make the difference. Youre the same fucking people that refuse to recognize the fact that slavery and bigotry has condemned millions to live in the shadows, and on and fucking on and fucking on. Get the Rona and die already. Ill be reading your obituaries with a smile on my face. Im so done with you fuckers! P.S. Sorry folks. I used to be a good person who cared. That person done died after 30+ years of this right wing bullshit. They won. My empathy is gone.

If We Cant or Wont Figure This Out We Might as Well Open the Gates to the Barbarians . There is a story that a Roman aristocrat opened the gates of Rome to the Visigoths in 410AD. He did it because this was the third siege of Rome that he had endured and he didnt want to do it anymore. Now there is a lot of fog with that story but it does make a great point. We are becoming as a nation a lot like Rome. We have been on top for a while and figure that we no longer have to work for our place. We see it in the Karens of the world and their male counterparts, the Teds. We see drama everywhere for everything and so much of it is fake BS. But they get away with it so others follow in their footsteps and the media gives them notoriety for it. The national symbol should be that for Narcissism because that is what we are now about. The entire anti-vax movement and resistance to getting a shot is so much like the Roman aristocrat. I just dont want to be bothered! . But the one that borders on malignant Narcissism is how Joe Biden is being blamed for inflation. There is a whole lot of insanity (Narcissism) at work here. Before economics went Voodoo with Reagan and both parties fell in lockstep to protect it, there was real economics. During the pandemic, many of us bought way more things than we have ever before. Amazon was some kind of therapy because so many were deprived of their constant interaction and their phone wasnt good enough. So they bought everything under the sun. Now into the second and third years of this pandemic, we still are. We buy the vast majority of it from China and it has to be paid for. The oil cartel has taken advantage of it to screw us to the wall, every business is raising prices well beyond their costs and for that reason they are bringing in, record profits. I REPEAT THEY ARE MAKING RECORD PROFITS!!!. And yet in so many Karen and Ted minds, it is beyond them to figure this out. The media makes sure everyone knows who to blame and GOP/ Con politicians make sure too. But this is not the government at work here, it is what we have allowed as a faux monopoly economy at work here. . Societies usually have ebbs and flows. We are going through a hell of an ebb right now. But its not just that, which is so scary. Its that smart people are so easily misled while readily apparent facts go unseen, discarded, and ignored. THAT! That is what is so scary. That stupid and self-centered rules and it is right there to be seen in the media, every night and day. If we cannot stop this fall into self-centered stupidity, then we are indeed doomed. RC Romine

I had support for the protests following George Floyd condemning obsessive police force. That should not make me guilty with association with the Marxist and/or violent elements of that movement. I have support for the trucker protests that are protesting mandates (You can be pro vax and anti mandates) That should not make me guilty with association with with some of the nationalists/ alt-right elements. Unless the bad elements in either case become the primary objective of the movement, than I see no reason to disassociate. It would be a dream come true for these authoritarian factions to go to some island and leave the rest of us alone.
I like to look for the good side in everything. Re: republican anti-vax movement Fewer republican voters in the future, an added benefit - it will raise the national average IQ!

I'm not sure if Covid is being exaggerated or if Jimmy Dore really gives a shit about anything beyond ratings.. but taking precautions to be safe and asking why progressives aren't pushing harder to make needed changes are o.k. I'm so tired of the """"fake virus, fake squad"""" posts pushing dumb conspiracies.. Just as tired of hearing that Trump sucks. This page shouldn't be a bitchfest or anti-vax medium used to push conspiracies. Let's exchange real ideas and share valid information. Here's my take: I think that regardless of how deadly Covid may or may not be- It is what it is. Our own government in both parties has crippled our means to survive and won't help us otherwise. How do we go forward? As for me I'd rather not take my chances and be wrong- just as global warming and dumping my trash in the ocean may not be as bad as many claim- I'm still going to try my best to take care of them.. As for """"shitty, fake, sellout AOC"""" voting for Pelosi.. Let's walk this through shall we? If not Pelosi, then who? Someone worse most likely. There are about less than 10 progressives among 100's of centrist assholes. Sure, it would have been a symbolic """"fuck you"""", but there wasn't going to be anyone else for speaker. We already know how spiteful the establishment is- do you really think there would have been a better outcome? As far as forcing an M4A vote- it would get shot down. And then centrists would use that over and over and over again as """"proof"""" that the people don't want it. And some handfuls of boommeriffic Karenesque dolts would buy into it- reinforcing the b.s. echo chamber of the establishment who's brainwashed them and making the next vote, and the next even harder. We need to vote more progressives in first. We do not have a large enough coalition yet. Sorry but that's the truth. I'm in government myself. I'm small potatoes but as a board member on parks and rec in a very small, conservative town I need to be very careful with my ideas, how I present them and who to or they WILL railroad me. I'm in secret talks with other """"downlow progressives"""" in my town who get it. We can't install a """"homeless shower"""" in our public park because 90% of our government would freak out that we communists are using taxpayer money to fund a homeless sanctuary.. so we sell the idea to the rest of the board as a """"much requested amenity by the boaters who pay for our parking and launch fees, thereby increasing revenue"""" etc.. It's bullshit, yeah.. but it's how things work here. Until we help more of us get elected to more posts, our power is limited. Our strength is in our numbers and also our knowledge of the process. Imo, based on my own actual, real world government experience as a 3 year appointed official, it's way way too early to write off any of the few progressive leaders we so desperately need right now. I highly encourage anyone reading this to sit in on some of their city council meetings that are open to the public- and better yet, go for an open seat on a committee.. because many of you literally have absolutely 0 clue how government or the process works. It's not easy. I am 20 to 25% of a vote that deals with things that can cost my small town 6 or more figures. That last vote I had to choose between additional $180k night lighting for a baseball field (where most of our adult council members are huge night baseball fans) or to refurbish the only children's playground in town and the only place for poor families and young kids to hang out. I was the only vote for the playground, the other members voted to add more lights to our already illuminated field. They were not happy with my vote and they still got their stupid, wastefull, unnecessary lights anyway. Because of my votes they may not want me on the committee when my term expires.. I don't know. But the point is you don't either. I'm not yet ready to write AOC off.

IMO, most Republicans are not scared of or appose to the vaccines. I would guess that 20% might legitimately have concerns about it's safety, or caught up in Q-anon bull crap etc. But the other 80% are not anti-vax, they are anti-Democrat. They just want Biden to fail. They seem to be willing to blindly follow Trump's obvious lies all the way to the graveyard. They are literally dying for Donald Trump! This is beyond demented. This is insane! Thanks for the vent:cursing_face:

I'm trying hard to be a good Catholic and pray for the sick, but a few high profile Catholics, a cardinal and a radio host who are anti vax conspiracy conservatives have come down with covid. I instead pray that their circle learn from this and get vaccinated. Is that wrong? I don't want anything bad to happen to them, just that they learn from it.

column1: Third District Iowa Democrats Discussion Group
column30: I've decided to try to extend my opinion on covid-19 by posting in all of the groups I follow. When tuberculosis (TB) was rampant in the United States of America, people who exhibited any symptoms or tested positive were hospitalized in Tuberculosis Sanitariums. If they refused they were forcibly hospitalized there until they were cured. Until leprosy was understood, people with it (lepers) were shunned and forced out of cities to survive on their own. Covid-19 is still not fully understood, but anybody with an understanding of how medications are approved for use by the medical community in the United States of America knows that their first concern is do no harm. Then they begin the process of approving for trials where the stated purpose for the medications is tested in controlled conditions. The covid-19 vaccine development used mrna research to quickly develop the primary vaccines we use in the United States of America. They had a significant head start on vaccine development. That meant vaccine development didn't start from the very beginning, but focused on utilizing mrna as the delivery system. Trials began much faster than normal because of the head start mrna gave them and because Operation Warp Speed created focus on a vaccine for covid-19 by all pharmaceutical and health research organizations. I have a small pox vaccination scar, but my grandchildren don't. I have had multiple tuberculosis tests, but I don't know that my grandchildren have had any unless required by their environment. My mom took me to get the Salk polio vaccine the first time I could get it. I've had measles, for which I continue to suffer because of the virus it left in my body. My grandchildren have not. Public health is a great thing until it inconveniences us. Peanut products are excluded from many classrooms because a child might have a life-threatening allergic reaction. Public schools require proof of vaccination for several diseases. Covid-19 is just one more thing to make schools safer for students, teachers and all other staff. When I worked in surgery and other health care settings, I was often required to wear a mask. If the doctor required masks I wore one. Otherwise I was expelled from the room because my refusal wasn't in the best health interest of everyone else in the room. If an infection was discovered in the Healthcare facility, every protocol was stepped up by at least a factor of 10. We not only protected the patient and ourselves, but everybody in the building complex. I've written all of this to nudge you to think about others, students, teachers and all staff. Hopefully that will get you to the decisions to do your part to protect the most people. We can get through this just as we in the United States of America have been able to survive previous health scares. Vax up! Mask up! It will get us back to some normalcy until we beat covid-19 and all its variants. Peace

I'm speaking of course, of Tantrum Throwing Manchildren demanding the right to spread a disease that's killed millions around the world. This is all coming on the heels of a new study showing the unvaccinated are 23 times more likely to be hospitalized with Covid than those of us who don't have skulls full of hornets and rat shit, and how fun is it to live in a society where absolutely no one expects data that clear to change anyone's behavior, because a certain political party decided it would be a good idea to brainwash their base into hating science? Egged on by the shittiest propagandists on the planet, the Freedumb Convoy descended upon Ottawa, bringing with them all the familiar hallmarks of MAGA """"culture"""" the just because we lost the election doesn't mean you don't have to do what we want bullshit, the vandalism and violence, and of course the swastika ( stealing food from the homeless was a nifty innovation, though.) They screamed and held up signs that read """" The Jew is the Devil"""" and """" Jews rape children and drink their blood """" Vax the Jews """" and of course gave the Nazi salute. I'm sure that was the side with the fine people, or maybe it was the other side. It's so hard to tell. I suppose it was only a matter of time before America started exporting our LEAST welcomed, apparently endlessly renewable resource of racist assholes. God knows we've got a surplus domestically. Never stop demanding more my brothers and sisters :heart:

NEWSCUM IS TRYING TO FIGHT BACK !! HAHAHAHAHHHAA THE POS SENT THIS I am writing to let you know that we recently launched our campaign to stop the Republican recall attempt in California. I am not going to take this recall attempt lying down. I'm going to fight because there's too much at stake in this moment. And today, I am asking you to join me: Please add your name to say you oppose the far-right Republican recall effort in California. It is critical you make your voice heard from the start of this effort. First and foremost, I need you to know I am not going to be distracted from the critical work we have to move us forward in California. That means getting more vaccines in people's arms, more people back to work, and more kids back in the classroom. But that means I need your help defeating this recall effort. And let's call it what it is: it's a partisan, Republican recall -- backed by the RNC, anti-mask and anti-vax extremists, and pro-Trump forces who want to overturn the last election and have opposed much of what we have done to fight the pandemic. If they are successful, it would mean risking the progress we are making to end the pandemic. We can't let that happen. California cannot afford to be sidetracked by partisan political games. So we'll fight this recall for the reason I am fighting to get every Californian vaccinated -- because ending this pandemic as quickly as possible is too important to get delayed by Trump loyalists and far right-wing Republicans. But I cannot do that alone. Add your name: say you oppose the Republican recall effort in California. This is important. Thank you for joining me in this effort. It means a lot to know that we're in this together. All my best, Gavin

The Chain . Stevie Nicks wrote a song about her experience with abuse, The Chain. But the lyric that tells the tale is You would never break the chain (Never break the chain) That is indeed the situation we find ourselves in. . This is not necessarily a story of good and bad. But it is one of winners and losers in the Reagan Revolution and the Cons takeover of the economy. The Cons themselves are bad, they have driven this nation into an authoritarian disaster. But those that went with the Reagan Revolution simply see themselves as those that were smart enough to go with the flow and thrived from it. They are so tied into the abuse of the lower and middle class that they see it as their due. They see economic segregation as simply the way of the world, they see the off-shoring of American jobs as others wanting too much. Even though there is no limit to what they want. As it becomes more and more apparent that they screwed the pooch, we see and more of the Karen and Ted effect. Its not about greed and its aftermath, its about freedom and themselves being exploited by poor people. Its really about Narcissism and the faith that they can never be wrong, especially when they are. So Trump was no aberration, he is simply the norm to them. . What is now Trumpism has always been here. Its about seeing the world through the prism of greed and selfishness. That everyone else is wrong, socialists, communists looking to take away everything from them. Taxes are the wages of governmental sin, God is with them because, and of course God is. The Karens and Teds see themselves as righteous winners, no matter how much they screw up OUR nation. We should really have no surprise when the anti-vaxers showed up because they are just Karens and Teds looking for a cause to preach to others. Right or wrong, it doesnt matter. Its all about them anyway. Anti-vax was just there and available. In so many households in America, particularly in the upper-middle class, it is the Karen and Ted show. Their much-deserved wealth and winner status is dissolving as the corporations become more and more greedy. Their life on credit is balancing on a pin, their lifestyles and image are all wrapped up into their illusion. Their 401k, is simply a con and so they make sure to vote for anyone that will protect the con and their illusion. If democracy dies, if the poor people suffer, then so be it. As long as the police can keep it under control. Abuse is the name of the game and they are vested in its image, things, and politics. . Keeping it going is all they can do. They live to retire and live in luxury. If they can just keep the Dems and the progressives/ socialists out. That somehow with Republicans in charge of swing state government they were cheated! Their 401k will die along with their image and dreams. The chain of economic, social, and political abuse must be kept intact for them to thrive. Going to church substitutes for morals, their ass in the pew makes it all right. Have to keep it all going or the world I need will die. The Karens and Teds, the fragile that need to abuse others to be happy and whole. This is what narcissism is all about. They deserve to abuse, to have things to show the world they are special, superior. The Cons game of thrones is all there is. The lies and message give reason to their need to abuse, their Karens and Teds screaming and shaking, blaming everyone for their actions is what they have become. Just like Donald Trump, they are winners, the privileged, and the protected. It is time to quit letting them get away with it! RC Romine

column1: Joe Biden, 46th U.S. President!  Real Democrats of the USA NEWS!
column30: The coup continues & everything Republicans are doing confirms it: vote suppression, anti-vax, women's rights; death to democracy.

The debt ceiling was not breached. Moscow Mitch relented but never forget he always does things for his on self-serving devious purposes so we can figure out why he blinked. Don't count his blinking as a victory he still has something more sinister in mind. And Democrats remember the prophetic words of that straight arrow Democrat Will Rogers, """"I'm not a member of an organized political party, I'm a Democrat!"""" We Democrats like to bicker and fight among ourselves so much that we often get left out when it comes to making that difference in the world for those less fortunate than ourselves. We need to take a page from the lock-step play book of ole mitch and learn to work together long enough to save our democracy and worry less about immaterial things and work harder on things that matter. We have a lot of great ideas but we fight among ourselves so much that most of those ideas die on the vine. The trumpian cloned GOP stands for nothing and if they can keep this nation's electorate dozing off long enough plan to establish a non-democratic minority rule party of which donald j trumpf will become dictator-in-chief come January 2025 if not before. If they take over congress next year look for a move to oust President Biden and install the trumpf on his coveted throne in the Oval Office as our first dictator ala Julius Caesar shortly thereafter. Don't believe it can happen then you haven't been paying attention! Freedom to not vax, freedom to not mask, freedom to die of COVID-19 all of that will be restored under a trumpf dictator ship. Freedom will become just another word for nothing left to lose to borrow a line from an old Kris Kristopher son song. There won't nothing left to lose because we will have lost it all! Lost it all just so a bunch of idiots decided they didn't like living in a sometimes dysfunctional messy experiment in Democracy and would rather have a narracistic, misogynistic orange private parts grabber dictator-in-chief, who only cares about himself in charge rather than work on providing for the general welfare, establishing justice and providing for our common defense. Jack D. Ripper in charge really????? Bob Bearden

The Python . It is ironic that the Union Plan to strangle the South through blockade was called the Anaconda Plan. Because the Cons (Rich Ultra Conservative Authoritarians) are acting like a python to squeeze democracy to death, before they swallow it. . You can hear the ribs cracking now if you listen, if you ignore the media Infotainment and the Cons Fox New propaganda machine. Democracy is being crushed to death before they swallow it whole. Already the opposition to it are being named and characterized as some sort of criminal or something to fear. Ownership of information, the destruction of truth, logic-based decision making, and ethics are being squeezed into ruin. You can see it if you look beyond the semi-truth we are given and to the forces causing it. This is nothing less than a cold civil war, for the soul of America. . Lets begin with a discussion of rights and the abuse of the concept of sacrosanct rights. There is a bubble around all of us that we own as human beings. That is what rights are. That bubble is the area we control around us. But here is where the Cons and Regressives arguments fall apart. From policing to abortion, the Cons and Regressives work as hard as they can to penetrate that three feet bubble that we own, that is our real right. Their lie is even more exposed, as being complete bullshit by their arguments about abortion, and education, masks, and vaccine. Because their actions go well beyond that 3 feet bubble and look to purposefully invade your space, your rights while claiming there are perfectly protected. From their ownership of the media and control of content to their out-and-out propaganda machine, they seek to invade your 3 feet bubble. Their screams and yells, reinforce by intimidation and violence are nothing more than the rants of authoritarians, seeking control of your space, freedoms. . The anti-maskers and anti-vax people simply are looking to take away your freedoms for their comfort. They seek to control your space, your mind as they do the Base of racists and the authoritarian-minded. Free-thinkers are dangerous! Because the existing Abuse Culture demands people to fit into a certain perception of things. In a slightly different way as seen in 1984 and other dystopian books. That is why they enable their most ardent of fools to enforce for them, the intrusion into our private space with intimidation and violence. They seek to enable, much like the Communists to have neighbors denounce neighbors except to have those neighbors shoot you and the police do nothing. Those that defend their 3 feet, become the enemy. Those that willingly give up, are rewarded with peace. Those that enforce it are given things to prove their loyalty. This is the python squeezing the life out of our nation, our democracy. . We must begin by defending our 3 feet bubble. But as with a python, we must remember that you can chop up the body and it may eventually die, but to kill a python before it kills democracy, as the old saying goes, you must cut off its head. RC Romine

column30: VACCINATION CARD Hello. -Hi, table for two, please. -Sure, and your name. -Cody. -Great. And do you and your guest have your vaccination cards? -Hmmm well first..Can you tell us who our server will be? -Um, looks like Brad will be your server tonight. -Great. Can you show us Brad's vaccination card? -Um... -And also, can you provide me with proof that Brad is not a carrier of HIV, Hepatitis A or B, or any other communicable diseases? Same for you and the kitchen staff. -Um... -Also, we would prefer not to be served by someone who is on or uses recreational drugs such as marijuana, cocaine, meth, fentanyl, etc, so if you could provide us with Brad's most recent tox screen, that would be great. Matter of fact, I'm going to need to see all of your employees medical history. -Um... Let me get the manager for you. -That would be great, thanks. Make sure they have their vax card and medical records please. Heres the thing, nobody needs restaurants. And other places. But they need us. Start standing your ground. Stolen and passing along

Watching the legacy media try their best to smear and degrade the most prominent podcasts and podcasters is becoming more and more entertaining. They are simply bitter and desperate because independent media and free-form platforms not driven by a corporatist agenda are rapidly shrinking their influence, I heard CBS news report that Neil Young wants to remove his music off of Spotify because of vax misinformation spread by conservative podcaster Joe Rogan Young, nor those who agree with him have much of anything to say when the legacy/cable media lie on the regular. Only someone who has never listened to that podcast would refer to Joe Rogan as conservative. Last I checked, conservatives dont openly advocate for UBI programs and Medicare For All or allow Bernie Sanders to speak freely for over 90 minutes. . . but in this day and age, if you think that everyone should be able to share their perspective freely as laid out by the Constitution, that alone makes you conservative - or the enemy to the most dedicated legacy media disciples. Actually, my impression is that most people who criticize the JRE podcast have never heard it because they so often criticize something said by a guest as something said by JR and then say he and his show should be censored. I can remember a time, not 20 years ago when the left was shouting in opposition to the government and the right was telling everyone to shut up lol. If you think an idea is bad, challenge it with a better one because crying for censorship isnt and has never been the right answer.

With all due apologies, I acknowledge many members of this group will have been more politically active and experienced than I am. I promise to seldom post, but I have a thought to put before you. I have had interactions with a number of people who seem entitled and privileged but seem to wish to affect otherwise. To explain, these are seeming social justice warriors who are acrimonious and can't seem to form coalitions to achieve meaningful change. To explain, they might march in Black Lives Protest events but seem intent on making their march more about getting attention for themselves. In the specific example I have mind, a so called advocate for LGBT issues was being told to shut up by actual LGBT people because they were being insulted by her presumption and intolerance. I suspect there is a form of SJW who is like a narcissistic human version of the cuckoo bird. (Short version, the bird puts its eggs in the nests of other birds and her chicks push the other eggs out of the best.) So, I am not an African American. I support their cause and needs, but I want to give them support as opposed to inserting myself. My ego doesn't need to be on the screen. However, some white people seem to be attacking a successful female black lawyer who was chosen for VP. This is what inexplicable if they care about the issues in a way that needs concrete change. On any liberal issue. Joe isn't Trump and Kamala isn't Pence. Healthcare, MeToo, BLM, police brutality, affordable college, social security, welfare, and appropriate COVID response. On any liberal issue the choice for President is Joe/Kamala vs Trump/Pence. Any attack on Joe/Kamala should be phrased in such a way to point out that Trump/Pence is a better choice. No false choice. This is the actual choice at this point. On no liberal point I know of is Trump a better choice than Joe. So the """"Warriors"""" aren't loyal to any particular cause. Certainly, they are not loyal to the Democratic Party. You might suggest they are loyal to their Prophet, Bernie, but he has said explicitly for his followers to support Joe. There is no, apparent, explanation for their aversion to Joe in the current context. Their actual goals are an indecipherable mystery. They are no more responsive to reason or discussion than an anti-vax or anti-mask conspiracy theorist. Their minds are, so far as I can tell, inscrutable. Quite possibly, they have formed some odd addiction to arguing and being an outsider that being angry and ranting is, actually, their only divisive goal. Some emotional compulsion requires them to dig in come whatever may. And here is the important point (thanks for humoring me) because the actual results don't really matter. They exist in a state of Privilege where if, say, a black man has his neck knelt upon by a cop while saying """"I can't breathe"""" as being filmed with several of his buddies standing by doing nothing to preserve the life of an American citizen *it doesn't matter enough to them that this happens to stop arguing and defeat Trump so actual change of any sort can possibly happen to improve the situation.* Essentially, I suspect the very worst racists who are most responsible for systemic racism may actually attend Black Lives Matter marches.
